name: Dizzy House Defender
description:
Hello welcome to Dizzy house defender. Dizzy house defender  is a mini tower defend game that put heavy emphasis on trading difficulty for economy or the other way around. This game is all about trial and error,  so patience is key.

  • Hold S to see the in game control.
  • Press A to gain cash but it will increase the threat level at the same time (The higher the threat level the more dangerous enemy there will be).
  • Press D to reduce the threat level but it also reduce the cash amount.
  • Press 1 to spawn turrets or to give max ammo to existing turrets. (cost $500)
  • Press 2 to repair house durability to max. (cost $2500)
  • Press 3 to increase the reduction rate of the threat level by X2 (cost $2500)
  • Press 4 to launch (cost $10,000)

If the timer or the house durability is reduced to 0 then the game is over. Good luck and have fun. Spin to win.
